description:
Haru is a young boy that lives with his parents on Akala Island. He often waits for the milk delivery from Kaki each morning. The day that Ash was visiting, Haru was planning to make a birthday cake with his father and they couldn`t make it without fresh Moomoo Milk from Kaki`s farm.
Kiawe had never been late delivering the milk but the morning of the milk delivery for the cake, he encountered Skull Gang and was delayed. He apologized and made it up to Haru by having a battle with Ash in Haru`s yard.
name: Haru
